title: Convenient location for commuters – On the bus line! 1 bed, 1 bath
posting_body: ['-- Embarcadero Club --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1207', 'Apartment:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '600 sq ft', 'Embarcadero Club Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we directly on the MARTA bus line, but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical, Turner Field and numerous restaurants and retail establishments.', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta and Henry County.', 'This home boasts a separate living and dining area with breakfast nook, and lots of closet space.', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '➢ 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Parking', '➢ Picnic Area', '➢ Playground', '➢ Clubhouse with Huge Meeting Room', '➢ Convenient to I-285', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Less Than 5 Minutes To Hartfield-Jackson', '➢ Lighted Tennis Courts', '➢ Mature Landscaping', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Pet Care', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', 'Apartment features include:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Balcony', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Deck', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Window Coverings', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Microwave', '➢ Views', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '2210 Sullivan Road', 'College Park, GA 30337', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Managed by Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '0C17AD68BBB645']
